summary: The sun blinds you in real life. This is it
descriptionHtml:
This is not mine. All credit goes to Tur

==DESCRIPTION==
this mod change the default sunglare with one more realistic
I made it with gimp using the \"supernova\" effect and a lens effect

==ISTALLATION & UNISTALLATION==
put the file into C/program files/steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim/data/textures/sky and say yes on overwrite.

To unistall just delete the file.

=LEGAL=
you can use this mod as you wish , just remember to credit

~Tur
author: Tur
